actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Energy Policy and Conservation Act to reduce from 20 percent to 5 percent the minimum shortfall of petroleum supplies which the President must find exists before a rationing contingency plan may be put into effect under section 202(d) (2) (A) of such Act.

summary.text: Amends the Energy Policy and Conservation Act to reduce from 20 percent to five percent the minimum shortfall of petroleum supplies which the President must find exists before a rationing contingency plan may be put into effect under such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Energy Policy and Conservation Act to reduce from 20 percent to 5 percent the minimum shortfall of petroleum supplies which the President must find exists before a rationing contingency plan may be put into effect under section 202(d) (2) (A) of such Act.
